com.deltaxml.api

Class XMLCombinerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deltaxml.api.XMLCombinerFactory

  • public abstract class XMLCombinerFactory
extends java.lang.Object

    An XMLCombinerFactory uses the factory design pattern to create XMLCombiners in a pluggable manner. The use of this pattern follows the pluggable parsers and pluggable transforms model adopted by the JAXP interface.

    The system property that determines which Factory implementation to create is named: com.deltaxml.api.XMLCombinerFactory. This property names a concrete subclass of the XMLCombinerFactory abstract class. If the property is not defined, a platform default is used.

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static XMLCombinerFactory newInstance()
                                      throws XMLCombinerFactoryConfigurationError

        Obtain a new instance of a XMLCombinerFactory. This static method creates a new factory instance.

        This method uses the following ordered lookup procedure to determine the XMLCombinerFactory implementation class to load:

        1. Use the class name specified by the com.deltaxml.api.XMLCombinerFactory system property.
        2. Use a platform default XMLCombinerFactory implementation.

        Once an application has obtained a reference to a XMLCombinerFactory it can use the factory to configure and obtain XMLCombiner instances.

        Returns:
        a new XMLCombinerFactory instance, never null.
        Throws:
        XMLCombinerFactoryConfigurationError - If the implementation is not available or cannot be instantiated. May contain a wrapped exception.

      • newXMLCombiner

        public abstract XMLCombiner newXMLCombiner()
                                    throws XMLCombinerConfigurationException
        Create a new XMLCombiner object.
        Returns:
        An XMLCombiner object.
        Throws:
        XMLCombinerConfigurationException - If problems configuring the combiner.

      • getFeature

        public abstract boolean getFeature(java.lang.String name)

        Look up the value of a feature.

        A factory feature can be used to obtain information about the features supported by underlying XMLCombiner objects. For example, in the current XMLCombiner implementation:

        getFeature("http://javax.xml.transform.sax.SAXSource/feature")

        would return true, while:

        getFeature("http://javax.xml.transform.sax.DOMResult/feature")

        would return false.

        Parameters:
        name - The feature name (an absolute URI).
        Returns:
        The current state of the feature (true or false).
